## What is ore handling?tankandlift
What are the ore dressing methods? Ore-dressing methods fall naturally into two general subdivisions— (1) concentration methods and (2) direct-recovery methods (amalgamation and leaching or wet methods). Concentration methods are employed to remove worthless gangue material and concentrate the valuable minerals of the crude ore in a smaller bulk.

## Patio process
The patio process is a process for extracting silver from ore. Smelting, or refining, was necessary because silver does not occur by itself in a natural state like some metals. ## Mercury-Free Gold Extraction Using Borax for Small-Scale Gold Miners
One of the most widespread gold extraction methods used by small-scale gold miners is whole ore amalgamation. In brief the method is as follows. After gold ore is mined, it is crushed to about walnut size mostly by hand. The crushed material is transferred to a metal drum and milled with hard metal rods or balls together with water and mercury.

## USA1 - Mineral ore slurry viscosity modification method 
A method of decreasing the viscosity of a mineral ore slurry is disclosed. The method comprises adding to a mineral ore slurry a viscosity modifying treatment such as copolymers of maleic anhydride and diisobutylene; copolymers of acrylic acid and allyl hydroxypropyl sulfonate ether, terpolymers of acrylic acid and 2-acrylamide-2-methypropane sulphonic acid salt and t-butyl acrylamide
